base_description: Modern, three-piece faucet set in matte black.
part_description: Includes a curved spout and two cylindrical handles, symmetrically arranged. The spout is central with handles on either side.
internal_interaction_description: The spout connects to water supply lines, while the handles control water flow and temperature. Each handle operates independently, with internal valves adjusting the mix of hot and cold water before it exits through the spout.
external_interaction_description: The faucet set is installed on a sink or countertop, interacting with plumbing systems. Users turn the handles to control water output, adjusting temperature and pressure. The spout delivers water into a basin for washing or cleaning purposes.
